page.title: 08PUBLIC TRANSPORT-ETTINGTON
page.content:
Never Sometimes Weekly Daily Men 51 2 1 0 Women 35 24 3 2 Children 25 27 3 50 O.A.P. 5 6 2 0 Teenagers 63 44 12 0
More women use buses than men, usually when they have not got a car or are not able to have their husbands' car. Many children use buses to travel to school. Old Age Pensioners who do not drive use the bus to go to Stratford. During the week the bus service starts at 7.30 a.m. with buses approximately every hour and a quarter until 6.30 p.m. On Saturday the bus service starts at 8.15 a.m. with three further buses in the morning and four in the afternoon.The last one is at 6.27p.m. There is no bus service on Sundays.
